title: Bad Childhood, Good Life Week: My Daddy Doesn’t Want Me
description:
Madeline is sad that her father is spending less time with her as he places his priorities towards his newly pregnant girlfriend. - Dr. Laura: "There are some things we can never have."

What things do you wish you could of had? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “Bad Childhood, Good Life”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-bad-childhood-good-life

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
